name: Corvidae
description:
The aim of Corvidae is to explore a metroidvania style game world and gain abilities through defeating bosses and completing quests given by characters located around the maps.  

There is a secret room, only accessible after defeating the final boss, if you find it lemme know!

This is my entry for the Search for a Star 2021 programming jam, I really enjoyed making this game and although it needs a lot of work I'm happy with what I made!

Controls:
